Title: The Greatest Stories From the Quran
Author: সানিয়াসনাইন খান
Summary:
‘The Greatest Stories From the Quran’ Book Contents:*

In the Beginning- 6 *
The Garden of Paradise- 10 *
The Sacrifice of the Brothers- 12 *
The Ark of the Prophet Nuh - 14 *
The Great Flood- 16 *
Allah's Best Friend- 20 *
The Lonely, Barren Valley- 22 *
The Great Sacrifices- 24 *
The First Call for Hajj- 25 *
The Pious Man and His Sons- 26 *
Sweet Patience- 28*
The Family Unites-32*
 The Queen Who Saved the Baby- 34 *
Allah Speaks to Musa-   36 *
The King's Magicians -38 *
The Cruel King Drowned- 40 *
The Prophet King- 42 *
The Valley of Ants- 44 *
The Queen and the Bird- 46* 
The Most Honorable Woman- 48*
 Food From the Heavens- 50 *
Sleepers in the Cave- 52 *
Tale of a Fish- 54 *
The Iron Wall-56 *
The Story of Two Gardens- 58 *
The Camel and the Evil People- 60 *
The Most Patient Man- 62*
 The Search for Truth- 64 *
The Best Caller to Gods Way- 66*
The Prophet Muhammads Message of Peace- 70
Book_Title: The Greatest Stories From the Quran

Title: My Ramadan Fun Book (Puzzels, Crosswords, Wordsearches, Colouring And Many Other Activities) (Age 7-10)
Author: তাহেরা কাসামালী
Summary: Islamic fun books are designed to help children learn more about Islam in a creative and interesting manner. The books contain imaginative and interesting activities and illustrations to attract the attention of young children. Parents and teachers will find such books useful in teaching today s children about Islamic beliefs and practices.
Book_Title: My Ramadan Fun Book (Puzzels,Crosswords,Wordsearches,Colouring And Many Other Activities) (Age 7-10)

Title: Quran Story Mazes, The Story of the Prophet MUSA (A.) (Fun To Color And Do)
Author: সানিয়াসনাইন খান
Summary: This book is ideal for children of 5 years and upward. Through these mazes, children are introduced to the best-loved stories from the life of the Prophet, as well as to other relevant historical and factual information. The mazes are not only uniquely designed and fun to do but are also education, thus enabling children to readily understand the message of Islam.
Book_Title: Quran Story Mazes,The Story of the Prophet MUSA (A.) (Fun To Color And Do)

Title: Sleepers in The Cave Two Gardens
Author: সানিয়াসনাইন খান
Summary:
Goodword's Favourite Tales from the Quran are timeless, treasured stories, specially chosen for young children. These stories, which have proved the best loved from one generation to the next, can be clearly understood and are fun to read, share and enjoy. Their texts are the perfect gateway to your children's lifetime adventure of reading from the Quran.
Best-selling author, Saniyasnain Khan, has written numerous books for children. This series reflects his own love of storytelling and deep respect for the eternal message of the Quran. He hopes that this series will make these stories memorable for young children and will act as a foundation on which they may build a growing knowledge of Islam.
Book_Title: Sleepers in The Cave Two Gardens
